instructions: Choose Video mode. Tap the Record button or press either volume button to start recording. While recording you can do the following: Press the white Shutter button to snap a still photo. Pinch the screen to zoom in and out. On iPhone X and later, iPhone 8 Plus, and iPhone 7 Plus, toggle between the 1x zoom button and the 2x zoom button to zoom in and out, or use the dial to zoom up to 6x. Tap the Record button or press either volume button to stop recording.

Choose Slo-mo mode. Tap the Record button or press either volume button to start and stop recording. To snap a still photo while recording, press the white Shutter button. To set a portion of the video to play in slow motion and the rest at regular speed, tap the video thumbnail, then tap Edit. Slide the vertical bars below the frame viewer to define the section you want to play back in slow motion.

Choose Time-lapse mode. Set up your iPhone where you want to capture a sunset, traffic flowing, or other experience over a period of time. Tap the Record button to start recording; tap it again to stop recording.
